body.name: Cuisinart DCC-2650FR 12 Cup Extreme Brew Programmable Coffeemaker (Renewed)
features: 12-Cup Carafe with a drip-free pour spout and a comfortable handle for easy serving
Extreme Brew feature uses re-engineered brewing technology to deliver coffee up to 25% faster
Brew Strength Control allows you to enjoy your coffee Regular or Bold
Fully Automatic with 24-hour programmability, auto shutoff, and 1 to 4 cup setting
Adjustable Temperature Control offers a heater plate with High, Medium and Low settings to keep coffee at your preferred temperature
body.description: Always looking forward to that first cup of hot fresh coffee? Well now you can get it up to 25% faster with the Extreme Brew 12-Cup Programmable Coffeemaker! Packed with all your favorite features, this is truly the ultimate coffee-lover's machine.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 131 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #10,984 in Amazon Renewed (See Top 100 in Amazon Renewed) #649 in Renewed Home & Kitchen #1,053 in Coffee Machines

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2015
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I are in our sixties. That would indicate that we have owned "a few" coffeemakers in our time. This by far is the BEST! First of all it is beautiful to look at. It performs as indicated and the coffee taste magnificent. I would recommend this coffeemaker to anyone who wants ease of use, good tasting coffee and a beautiful unit. The price was amazing.By the way, I chose a refurbished unit that arrived looking brand new. It was well packaged and one could not tell if it was ever taken out of the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product...... but.....
reviews.reviewText: Now, granted, I've been using this for going on three years and been very happy with it's performance. And we drink a LOT of coffee.Having said that, however, for what one pays for this machine, one would think you would spend a little more money on the design of the hinge. The pins are quite tiny and today one broke off. So now the lid flops all over the place and is difficult to re-align and close properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great coffee maker!
reviews.reviewText: My Cuisinart coffee maker is very nice. I also have a Keurig for 1 cup of coffee. But most mornings I like the Cuisinart because I can have more than 1 cup. And the coffee is much cheaper than for the Keurig.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cuisinart coffee maker oval shape stainless steel
reviews.reviewText: Cuisinart is my coffee brand for coffee makers but this model disappointed me:Pro : nice design from stainless steal Yes it’s a little faster than the model I had before.Con: black plastic is medium quality Regular coffee setting is giving you coffee like a. tee. Bold setting it’s kind of ok for strength of it. All of this it’s not worth it for 120$ full price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets me through my mornings with ease
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite coffee maker to date. It brews very fast and the carafe pours very clean. I love the adjustable warmer and my coffee is always at the perfect drinking temperature. The Auto start is simple to program and hasn't failed me yet. It's very easy to clean as well and looks great! I bought this refurbished and certified for a lot less and I have had no problems with it. I recommend this to any coffee drinker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good machine, buy non-refurb if you want it to look original
reviews.reviewText: The machine works well, is easy to program, and produces good coffee.PRO:- The temperature control is a particularly useful addition over most models, though I wish I knew what temperatures each setting stood for. I don't like the coffee to be too hot so that it burns my tongue. I had started to pour the coffee into the travel mug before showering in the morning so that it could cool a bit. This makes that unnecessary.CON:- The drip pause feature (remove carafe and the spring stops it from dripping onto the platter) doesn't work very well.DEPENDS ON YOU:- The lid on the carafe does not pivot. It clips on, which may be helpful for letting you pour without the lid flipping up and dumping coffee out too quickly. It also makes cleaning the carafe harder. Don't know how well the snap-in tabs will hold up over time.PARTICULAR TO REFURB:- The refurbished unit that I bought has a large silver plug just off center on the heating platter. I returned the first for this and the second had it as well. I don't like it. It makes the carafe not sit particularly well on the platter. I'm living with this because I discarded the box and don't feel like trying to get it again. This "plug" was the reason given for returning the first one. I feel returning this one for the same reason would not result in getting one that doesn't have it. The machine works fine, but it does *not* look like an original, as Amazon's refurbished statement says it should. If the price difference between new and refurbished matters to you, this doesn't really have an effect on the functioning of the machine, but it is likely a thing you'll have to live with. (See photo for what I mean. Please ignore the coffee residue; the machine comes clean and neat, save the silver "plug.")

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really like this coffee machine
reviews.reviewText: Really like this coffee machine. It is a high quality product and has proven to be very dependable when I use the timed-brew. It's very stylish sitting on our counter top...you won't be disappointed in this coffee pot. It would have been nice to receive the gold-coffee filter with it, but that is an extra item. I use the brown paper #4 filters and they work well in helping to give a quality taste to our morning brew. The instructions for use are verysimple to read and implement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ... purchasing a refurbished coffee maker but this one is great! Makes a great cup of coffee
reviews.reviewText: Was a little leary of purchasing a refurbished coffee maker but this one is great! Makes a great cup of coffee, especially on the bold setting. Has a nice sleek look of stainless steel and black. I'm very pleased that Cuisinart has once again lived up to my expectations. I'll never buy a different brand.
Muy bien aun y cuando es reacondicionada. Definitivamente volveria a compra un producto de estos ya que cuentan nuevamente con garantia por cualquier desperfecto.
